thread.title: Names of 2 victims in fatal Buffalo fire released
thread.title_full: Names of 2 victims in fatal Buffalo fire released - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Names of 2 victims in fatal Buffalo fire released
text:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) - Authorities have released the names of two men who were killed in a weekend fire at an apartment building in Buffalo.
Officials say 64-year-old James Hodges and 58-year-old Edward Hughes died when the blaze swept through a rooming house on Curtiss Street around 4:30 a.m. Saturday.
The man who manages the building for his nephew told WGRZ-TV that 10 people lived in the building. The others got out safely.
The building is scheduled for demolition on Tuesday.
The cause of the fire is being investigated.
